subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Dense fog forced organizers to cancel two World Cup races in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany. A women’s super-G race was scheduled to follow the men’s downhill, but fog shrouded sections of the course.
snippet: Dense fog forced organizers to cancel two World Cup races in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany. A women’s super-G race was scheduled to follow the men’s downhill, but fog shrouded sections of the course.
